subNode:value.scalar:string: Generates a .CSV file for mass mailings
Operate a filter on customers' country.
The module "blocknewsletter" is required for this feature
No customers found with these filters!
The .CSV file has been successfully exported. (%d customers found)
WARNING: If opening this .csv file with Excel, remember to choose UTF-8 encoding or you may see strange characters.
c.`id_customer`, c.`lastname`, c.`firstname`, c.`email`, c.`ip_registration_newsletter`, c.`newsletter_date_add`
address` a WHERE a.deleted = 0 AND a.`id_customer` = c.`id_customer` AND a.`id_country` =
There are two sorts for this module:
Persons who have subscribed using the BlockNewsletter block in the front office.

This is a list of e-mail addresses of persons who come to your store that do not become customers, but have subscribed to your newsletter. Using the "Export Newsletter Subscribers" below will generate a .CSV file based on the BlockNewsletter subscribers data.
Customers that have checked "yes" to receive a newsletter in their customer profile.
The "Export Customers" section below filters which customers you want to send a newsletter to.
Export Newsletter Subscribers from the BlockNewsletter
Generate a .CSV file based on BlockNewsletter subscribers data.
Only subscribers without an account on the shop will be exported.
Generate a .CSV file from customer account data.
